Subject: Department not changing on client
Description: We need to switch a group of computers to a new EPP department that has different settings. When we uninstall the original client, and install the new client, it still retains the old department code.
What_We_Know__c:
Used: http://download.endpointprotector.com/debug_agent/epp_uninstall.zip  to uninstall.
We reinstalled the branded client and it worked.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting 1 week for customer to update department for more computers.
Solution_Comment__c: We provided the customer with a silent uninstall script and then used the branded EPP client installer and it worked.
Account_Name__c: University of Texas Health Science Center in Houston
